4441.quoteText: You are granting us with a non-exclusive, permanent, irrevocable, unlimited license to use, publish, or re-publish your Content in connection with the Service.
4441.title: The copyright license that users grant to the service is limited for the purposes of that same service, and not third parties.

tosdr.case: Copyright license limited for the purposes of that same service but transferable and sublicenseable
tosdr.tldr: Extract from the Terms of Service: 'You are granting us with a non-exclusive, permanent, irrevocable, unlimited license to use, publish, or re-publish your Content in connection with the Service.' Apart from the permance and irrevocability of the license all points are necessary as the website, among other things, acts as a distribution platform for the software of users.

4442.title: This service provides archives of their terms of service so that changes can be viewed over time

tosdr.case: This service provides archives of their terms of service so that changes can be viewed over time
tosdr.tldr: Whole ToS and Rules history can be found via the source link.

4443.quoteText: You agree to not use the Service to submit or link to any Content which is defamatory, abusive, hateful, threatening, spam or spam-like, likely to offend, contains adult or objectionable content, contains personal information of others, risks copyright infringement, encourages unlawful activity, or otherwise violates any laws.
4443.title: Users agree not to submit illegal content

tosdr.case: Users agree not to submit illegal content
tosdr.tldr: The ToS states that 'You agree to not use the Service to submit or link to any Content which is defamatory, abusive, hateful, threatening, spam or spam-like, likely to offend, contains adult or objectionable content, contains personal information of others, risks copyright infringement, encourages unlawful activity, or otherwise violates any laws.'

4444.quoteText: If you wish to close your account, please contact us.
4444.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time

tosdr.case: You have the right to leave this service at any time
tosdr.tldr: The ToS states 'If you wish to close your account, please contact us.' without any temporal limitation.

4572.quoteText:
<li>Keeping your account secure is your responsibility.
"I was hacked" and "It was my friend/brother" are not excuses.

Requests for Content to be removed or modified will be undertaken only at our discretion.

4574.title: Users agree not to use the service for illegal purposes

Content of an adult or sexual nature is strictly prohibited.
  1. The general guideline for this is that content must be "PG-13" or below.

4739.quoteText: You retain copyright over the Content.
4739.title: You maintain ownership of your data

4743.title: You can choose the copyright license

tosdr.case: You can choose the copyright license
tosdr.tldr: As Spigot is a forum and marketplace you can choose the copyright license you want to publish your software with. Open-Source projects are handled just like closed-source ones.

4745.title: There is a date of the last update of the terms

tosdr.case: There is a date of the last update of the terms
tosdr.tldr: See the source link in the lower left corner at the end of the terms.

4746.quoteText: We currently do not offer website functionality for you to opt out of any “do not track” signals or listings.
4746.title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.
